0.title: LiquidBounce b31
0.text: We added a HUD Editor which allows you to completely customize the clients GUI to your liking. We also made a new Main Menu design and added a few new AAC bypasses. The full changelog can be found here

1.title: LiquidBounce b29
1.text: KillAura has been improved and many new AAC bypasses have been added. We also added a Credits screen which allows you to see exactly who helped us developing LiquidBounce. Click here for the full changelog.
